commands.name: az sig share add
commands.summary: Share gallery with subscriptions and tenants.
commands.syntax:
az sig share add [--gallery-name]
                 [--ids]
                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                 [--resource-group]
                 [--subscription]
                 [--subscription-ids]
                 [--tenant-ids]
examples:
az sig share add --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery \
--subscription-ids subId1 subId2 --tenant-ids tenantId1 tenantId2

commands.name: az sig share enable-community
commands.summary: Allow to share gallery to the community.
commands.syntax:
az sig share enable-community [--gallery-name]
                              [--ids]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--subscription-ids]
                              [--tenant-ids]
examples: az sig share enable-community --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery

commands.name: az sig share enable-community
commands.summary: Allow to share gallery to the community.
examples: az sig share enable-community --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery

commands.name: az sig share remove
commands.summary: Stop sharing gallery with a subscription or tenant.
commands.syntax:
az sig share remove [--gallery-name]
                    [--ids]
                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                    [--resource-group]
                    [--subscription]
                    [--subscription-ids]
                    [--tenant-ids]
examples:
az sig share remove --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery \
--subscription-ids subId1 subId2 --tenant-ids tenantId1 tenantId2

commands.name: az sig share reset
commands.summary: Disable gallery from being shared with subscription or tenant.
commands.syntax:
az sig share reset [--gallery-name]
                   [--ids]
                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                   [--resource-group]
                   [--subscription]
examples: az sig share reset --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name MyGallery

commands.name: az sig share wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition of a shared gallery is met.
examples: az sig share wait --updated --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gallery-name Gallery
